readingMnemonic: Tree <kanji>root</kanji>s are the perfect roosting place for <reading>con</reading>dors (<ja>こん</ja>). Unfortunately, living on roots is also why they're always endangered. Condors can be killed pretty easily living on the ground on roots like this.
readingInfo: Picture a family of condors nestled at the bottom of a tree in its roots. Then a huge machine comes over and mows them all down as it cuts all the trees off their roots. Darn you humans! Do you have to ruin everything?!
